D

dialog - Variable in class View.ClientView
JDialog object for new game
dialog - Variable in class View.GameView
Dialog to provide color change during the game for the buttons
dim - Variable in class Game.GameBasic
Default dimension of the game
dimSize - Variable in class Model.GameModel
Dimension of the puzzle
displayErrorDialog() - Method in class View.GameView
Method name: displayErrorDialog Purpose: Display error message to the user when changing dimension in text mode Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message
displayLostDialog() - Method in class View.GameView
Method name: dialogLostDialog Purpose: Display a dialog that indicates that the user lost the game and provide user options to continue, new game, or exit Algorithm: Stops the timer and displays dialog with object options and restarts setting, starts new game, or exits system when user selects try again, new game, or exit game respectively.
displayShuffleErrorDialog() - Method in class View.GameView
Method name: displayShuffleErrorDialog Purpose: Display error message to the user when trying to start the game without shuffling Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane warning message
displayWinDialog() - Method in class View.GameView
Method name: dialogWinDialog Purpose: Display a dialog that indicates that the user won the game and provide user options to play again or exit Algorithm: Stops the timer and displays dialog with object options and new game or exits system when user selects play again or exit game, respectively.
dropDown() - Method in class View.GameView
Method name: dropDown Purpose: Contains initialization of components that are to be displayed on the panel Algorithm: Initialize the objects and sets the components in the correct location and adds it to the panel
